title: Kth Largest Element in an Array
description:
Given an integer array `nums` and an integer `k`, return the kth largest element in the array.

Note that it is the kth largest element in the sorted order, not the kth distinct element.

You should solve it without sorting the entire array if possible (but a sorting solution is acceptable).

examples.explanation: Sorted in descending order: [6, 5, 4, 3, 2, 1]. The 2nd largest is 5.
Sorted in descending order: [6, 5, 5, 4, 3, 3, 2, 2, 1]. The 4th largest is 4.
